title: AOC rejects Cruz support over Wall Street chaos: 'You almost had me murdered'
description: Democratic Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez on Thursday accused Republican Sen. Ted Cruz of "trying to get me killed" during the January 6 insurrection at the US Capitol and called for his resignation from the Senate, after the Texas Republican appeared to agree with her on the need for an investigation into Robinhood following chaos on Wall Street.

title: John King: This photo tells you everything you need to know about the GOP
description: CNN's John King discusses the meeting between Rep. Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) and former President Trump at Mar-a-lago and where the Republican party stands today.

title: Liquid nitrogen leak at food processing plant in US kills six
description: Six people were killed and 10 were taken to a hospital after a liquid nitrogen leak at a food processing plant in Gainesville, Georgia, officials said.

title: US economy saw worst year in 2020 since 1946
description: President Joe Biden continues to push for a bipartisan Covid-19 relief package as the pandemic's devastating impact on the US economy comes to light. CNN's Phil Mattingly reports.

title: Some in Poland may leave the country because of this law
description: Poland imposed a controversial near-total ban on abortions. See protesters react to the new law.

title: 'World's most dangerous' malware network taken down
description: Law enforcement authorities across several countries have taken down a network of what they describe as the "world's most dangerous malware."

title: Biden: Health care orders undo the damage Trump has done
description: President Joe Biden will reopen enrollment on the federal Affordable Care Act exchanges on as part of a series of executive actions related to health care, taking a step to help uninsured Americans that former President Donald Trump rejected.

title: Tunisian parliament reshuffled after violent protests
description: Ten years after Tunisians toppled their regime and sparked uprisings across the Arab world, they are back on the streets of Tunis and other cities. Nighttime clashes and rioting have engulfed the streets of some of the impoverished areas. The unrest erupted earlier this month over poverty, unemployment and a deteriorating economic situation made worse by the pandemic.

title: Millionaire couple accused of posing as workers to get vaccine in Canada
description: Canadian authorities say Rodney and Ekaretina Baker flew to a remote village in the Yukon to pose as local workers in order to skip the line and get the Covid-19 vaccine they weren't entitled to. CNN's Paula Newton reports.

title: Biden reverses Trump's 'global gag rule'
Levi's is embracing a baggy look
description: Skinny jeans have had their moment.

title: Biden's most important stimulus measure
description: The US federal government should spend more money, and fast, to fight the Covid-19 pandemic, rescue hard-hit families and help states, cities and small businesses. But it should also strive for a relief package built on some degree of bipartisan consensus.

title: Keilar: This senator only votes yes on overturning the election
description: CNN's Brianna Keilar calls out Sen. Josh Hawley (R-MO) for trying to walk back his role in the US Capitol insurrection while noting that Hawley, who has voted against all of President Joe Biden's nominees, only seems to vote yes when it comes to overturning elections.

title: The teacher who made Bernie Sanders' mittens has three pairs up for auction
description: The teacher who made the now infamous -- and not-for-sale mittens worn by Sen. Bernie Sanders during President Joe Biden's inauguration is auctioning off three more pairs.

title: A new malaria mosquito is emerging, and experts are worried
description: A new malaria mosquito is emerging in African cities, with potentially devastating consequences for those living there, according to a new study.

title: Pelosi slams Republican leadership for response to Marjorie Taylor Greene
3 teens arrested over house fire that killed Senegalese family of five in Denver
description: Three teenage boys were arrested in connection with a house fire that killed three adults and two children in Denver last year, authorities said.

title: What if China no longer needs Hollywood? That's bad news for the film industry
description: America has been the king of the box office for, well, forever. Not anymore.

title: AstraZeneca vaccine should not be given to people over 65, German health officials say
Police clash with ultra-Orthodox Israelis resisting Covid-19 rules
description: In ultra-Orthodox areas across Israel, police have clashed with members of the community angry at the government's attempts to impose nationwide lockdown rules on local schools and synagogues. Many Israelis are bitter over what they see as tolerance of lockdown violations by significant parts of the ultra-Orthodox community, a potent force in an election year. CNN's Sam Kiley reports.

title: First look at Kristen Stewart as Princess Diana
description: First images from the movie "Spencer" show Kristen Stewart as the late Princess Diana.

title: Hundreds flee as Indonesian volcano spews ash and smoke
description: Indonesia's Mount Merapi volcano on Java island erupted on January 28 spewing ash and smoke, and prompting authorities to warn of the risk of lava flows reaching roads, officials said.

title: Opera singers are helping 'long Covid' patients breathe
description: The English National Opera (ENO) is rolling out its singing, breathing and wellbeing program for recovering coronavirus patients around the country following a successful trial.

title: Spain launches low-cost bullet train between Madrid and Barcelona
description: Like many destinations around the world, Spain has been pretty much stopped in its tracks during the pandemic.

title: Carey Mulligan strikes back at review
description: Carey Mulligan has doubled down on her thoughts about a review which referenced her looks.

title: Avlon slams Capitol rioters: They supported a would-be tyrant
description: CNN's John Avlon sounds off on the rioters who breached the US Capitol, pointing out that they assaulted the Constitution despite some of them having military backgrounds and taking an oath to defend it.

title: VW overtaken as world's biggest automaker
description: Toyota is back on top.

title: More than 700 dead pelicans found in World Heritage site
description: Some 750 pelicans have been found dead in a UNESCO World Heritage site in northern Senegal that provides refuge for millions of migratory birds, the country's parks director said.

title: A musical museum first for African Americans
description: Sing gospel with Bobby Jones and record your own rap song. The first national museum to bring all African American musical genres together into one interactive space opens in Nashville.

title: Steamy period drama is Netflix's 'biggest series ever'
description: Netflix has just claimed its biggest hit ever with "Bridgerton," a drama set in Britain in the early 1800s.

title: The 14-year-old skateboarding prodigy chasing an Olympic dream
description: It's the kind of footage that wouldn't look out of place in any family's video archive, a toddler taking her first tentative steps at the playground.

title: Can you solve mystery of 60-year-old travel photos?
description: There was a time when Dutch creative director Jennifer Skupin actively sought out antique furniture and vintage items at flea markets. She was particularly interested in tracking down old photographs.

title: Minna Stess: The 14-year-old skateboarder with Olympic dreams
description: Even as a toddler, Minna Stess wanted to ride a skateboard. Now, at just 14, she is already ranked as one of the top 20 park skateboarders on the planet and has her eyes set on the Olympics.

title: Boris Johnson has a history of U-turns on Covid-19
description: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson is under fire over what critics call a pattern of late decision making and then reversing policy unexpectedly as the country has exceeded 100,000 Covid-19 deaths. CNN's Nic Robertson reports.

title: With more assertive China, US faces growing tensions in Asia
description: One of the biggest international challenges facing President Biden is a relationship with China, which had grown increasingly hostile under the Trump administration. Now, the Biden administration faces power struggles in Asia as China grows more dominant. CNN's Ivan Watson reports.

title: Demi Moore makes surprise cameo at Paris Fashion Week
description: Actress Demi Moore made her surprise runway debut on Wednesday, as she opened Fendi's virtual presentation during the couture shows at Paris Fashion Week.

title: Official: Millions in vaccine funds went to unrelated office costs
description: Millions of dollars in federal funds earmarked for vaccine development and other public health matters were wrongly used for the removal of office furniture, news subscriptions and other administrative expenses by an agency within the Department of Health and Human Services, according to an investigation launched by its inspector general into a whistleblower complaint.

title: Japan may need a miracle to pull off the Summer Olympics
description: UFC had "fight island." The NBA had "the bubble."

title: 'Cut that crap out': Top Republican tells GOP to stop attacking each other over Trump
Manaus is collapsing again. Is a new coronavirus variant to blame?
description: The tense quiet outside the small hospital in Iranduba, Brazil, shattered when the ambulance rolled up.

title: Video surfaces of Marjorie Taylor Greene confronting Parkland shooting survivor with baseless claims
description:
• Analysis: Why Republicans need to take a stand on Marjorie Taylor Greene
• Opinion: If Republicans don't denounce Marjorie Taylor Greene's extremism, they'll own it

title: Indonesia's Mount Merapi volcano erupts, spews clouds of ash
description: Indonesia's Mount Merapi volcano on Java island erupted on Wednesday, sending up a cloud of ash and prompting authorities to warn of the risk of lava flows reaching roads, officials said.

title: Pediatrician fatally shoots another doctor and himself during hostage situation, police say
description: A Texas pediatrician diagnosed with terminal cancer killed another pediatrician during a hostage situation before turning the gun on himself, according to an Austin Police Department news release.

title: Anxiety robbing your sleep? A weighted blanket may help
description: If you're interested in using a weighted blanket to relieve sleep problems related to mental or sensory disorders, here's what you should know about their effectiveness, any caveats and how to choose one.

title: Dr. Fauci: Getting vaccine doesn't mean you have free pass to travel
description: During a CNN Global Town Hall Hosted by Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta, Dr. Anthony Fauci answers a viewer's question about when immunity begins after receiving a Covid-19 vaccine.

title: CNN anchor: This is the kind of thinking the GOP is embracing
description: CNN's Erin Burnett wonders how House Republicans could remain silent over Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene's (R-GA) past comments supporting the execution of prominent Democrats and others about the Parkland school shooting. Rep. Greene was recently given a seat on the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: See playful panda cub's virtual debut
description: Cute panda alert! Since the Smithsonian's National Zoo is closed to visitors due to Covid-19, the staff brought its newest panda cub to the people with his first live virtual encounter. The cub, who is sweet on sweet potatoes, ate them throughout his debut. CNN's Jeanne Moos has more.

title: January has been the deadliest month for Covid-19 with nearly 80,000 lives lost so far in the US
Facebook plans to reduce political content in the News Feed
Former Russia oil tycoon: I was one of the lucky ones
description: CNN's Matthew Chance speaks exclusively with Mikhail Khodorkovsky, once Russia's richest man, who -- after falling out with Russian President Vladimir Putin himself -- spent more than 10 years in a Russian jail. He says the US should impose tough sanctions on Putin to save Alexey Navalny from a similar fate.

title: Electric car goes 0-60 in less than 2 seconds
description: According to its designers, the 1,914-horsepower Rimac C_Two hypercar will take a driver from 0 to 60 miles per hour in under two seconds, putting it among the quickest cars in the world. Its 258-mile per hour top speed is faster that a Bugatti Veyron, and its 340 mile driving range is impressive too.

title: Cloris Leachman, award-winning sitcom star, dead at 94
description: Cloris Leachman, the acclaimed actress whose one-of-a-kind comedic flare made her a legendary figure in film and television for seven decades, has died, according to a statement from her longtime manager and representatives. She was 94.
